articles.title: COVID-19 Update: People with High Levels of Cortisol or Stress Hormone May Have Higher Risk of Death - Tech Times
articles.description: Be extra careful if you have chronic stress.
articles.content: The current situation is extremely stressful, with everybody stuck at home, unable to meet their friends or family who live miles away. Millions of citizens in the United States are also currently un… [+3610 chars]

articles.title: Hundreds of millions of COVID-19 vaccine doses available for 2021 - WHO - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: “If we’re very lucky, there will be one or two successful [vaccine] candidates before the end of this year,” said Soumya Swaminathan, WHO chief scientist.
